ingredeints:
Ingredients

5 Hard-boiled Eggs

To spice up eggs

2 tsp Oil

1 tsp Chili powder

1/4 tsp Turmeric powder

Salt as needed

For Egg masala

3 tsp Oil

1 Cardamoms ( Optional) 

3 Cloves

1 Small piece Cinnamon

3 Onion (finely chopped)

1 tsp Ginger& Garlic paste

2 Green chilis

Few Coriander leaves (chopped)

1/2 tsp Turmeric powder

1 tsp Coriander powder

1/2 tsp Garam Masala

1.5 tsp Chili powder

1 tsp Red chili powder

2 Tomatoes (finely chopped)

1/4 cup Shredded coconut

Salt as needed
methods:
Boil and peel the eggs and keep it aside. In a pan heat 2 tsp of oil and add 1 tsp chili powder, 1/4 turmeric powder and needed salt.

Combine everything well and add 5 boiled eggs (cut into half).

Cook for 1-2 minutes each side and keep it aside.

In another pan, heat 3 tsp of oil and add 1 cardamoms, 3 cloves, and a small piece of cinnamon.

Add 1 finely chopped onion and saute for a minute.

Add 1 tsp of ginger and garlic paste, 2 green chilis and few chopped coriander leaves, cook till raw smell leaves off.
